body:
When I run your program using Go 1.6, I get

    xml: invalid tag in field Name of type main.Response: "KKName,cdata"

I do get your reported results with Go 1.5.  The problem is that a cdata element is not an XML element, and therefore should not have a name.

One way to get what you want is http://play.golang.org/p/-DVeAjptj5 .

Please take any questions about this to a forum; see https://golang.org/wiki/Questions.  Thanks.
